image-hover.name: Image Hover Mod
image-hover.description: Adds larger images on mouse hover. Will slow down page loads.

username.name: Your MyAnimeList Username
username.description: Must be entered exactly as it appears on MyAnimeList. This is not required, but will reduce the impact on page loads slightly.

hover.name: Activation Method
hover.description: When do you want the image to display: when hovering the entire row, or only the image?

review.name: Review-style/note-style Tags
review.description: Widens the tag box and condenses it all into one cohesive paragraph, disabling tag functionality. Great for mini-reviews or quick notes.

width.name: Section Width
width.description: This represents the maximum width. The actual width may be smaller to make room for other columns.

horizontal.name: Horizontal Tags
horizontal.description: Convert the vertical tags into a horizontal line across the bottom of each list item.

fav.name: Favourite Heart Tags
fav.description:
This modification changes the appearance of any tag called "Favourite" or "Favorite" to display at the side of the list entry as a heart.

[b]Limitations:[/b][list][*]This mod [u]cannot detect[/u] your MAL favourites. It only changes the appearance of correctly labelled [b]tags[/b], nothing more. Due to this, however, you can have more than 20 entries tagged as favourites. Part of why I made this was to circumvent the item limit on non-supporter profiles.[*]If using the left alignment with the unedited Image Hover mod then the hover image will cover up the tag on mouse-over. You can avoid this by setting the alignment to the right or using the On Image variant of the Image Hover Mod.[/list]

align.name: Positioning
align.description: Choose whether the tag gets positioned on the right or left of list items.

render.name: Character Renders
render.description: Adds two optional character renders on the left and right of the list. Do note that the renders will not be properly visible at low resolutions. I recommend having at least a 1600x900 monitor to add renders, as they purposefully do not intersect the center list area.

cat-banner.name: Per-category Banner Images
cat-banner.description: [i]This will override your earlier choice of image.[/i]

cat-character.name: Per-category Character Image
cat-character.description: [i]This will override your earlier choice of image.[/i]

cat-background.name: Per-category Background Image
cat-background.description: [i]This will override your earlier choice of image.[/i]

background-tint.name: Tint the Background Image
background-tint.description: Add a colour overlay to darken or accent your background image.

transparent-rows.name: Transparent List Rows
transparent-rows.description: Useful for displaying more of your background image. [i]This will not work without a background image.[/i]

banner-height.name: Change Banner Height
banner-height.description: Modify the banner height to your preference.

status-width.name: Change Category Bar Width
status-width.description: Increase the width of the coloured bar that indicates whether the entry is completed, dropped, etc.

header-line.name: Coloured Line on Header
header-line.description: Adds a coloured line around the header bar and avatar for some extra flair. Single colour variant.

header-line-cat.name: Coloured Line on Header - Category-coloured
header-line-cat.description: Adds a coloured line around the header bar and avatar for some extra flair. Category-coloured variant.

cat-header.name: Category-coloured Header Text
cat-header.description: Colours the header to match the referenced categories.

colours.name: Custom Theme Colours
colours.description: Create your own theme by replacing all the theme colours as you desire.

base.name: Colour Base
base.description: Provides the base colours for your custom theme.

light.label: Light

dark.label: Dark

--btn-bg.name: Button Background
--btn-bg.description: Background for secondary content (score, tags, search bar, etcetera).

--btn-bg-h.name: Buttons Background (hover state)
--btn-bg-h.description: Background for secondary content on hover. Also serves as a secondary colour for header buttons.

--btn-head-bg-h.name: Buttons Background (header, hover state)
--btn-head-bg-h.description: Background for header buttons on hover.

--cover-bg.name: Cover Background
--cover-bg.description: Colour used behind the cover image.

info-category-headers.name: Section/category Headers
info-category-headers.description: If you want section/category headers on the all anime page, just like classic lists, this is as close as you'll get. See the linked guide to install.

info-coloured-tags.name: DIY Coloured Tags
info-coloured-tags.description: Want to add some visual flare to your tag system? Check the linked guide for information on how to.

info-tag-descriptions.name: DIY Tag Descriptions
info-tag-descriptions.description: Want to explain your tag system to your list visitors, or perhaps just remind yourself? Tag descriptions can be useful! Check the linked guide for information on how to.
